faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about the AI Pattern Generator

items.title: What types of patterns can I generate?
items.description: You can create a diverse range of patterns including floral, geometric, abstract, and more. Just describe what you envision, and our AI will bring it to life.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many patterns I can generate?
items.description: No! You can generate as many patterns as you like. Each user is granted 50 free generation attempts daily.

items.title: Can I use the generated patterns commercially?
items.description: Absolutely! All generated designs can be used for commercial purposes, including on clothing, home decor, and more.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: Your prompts and generated patterns are processed securely within your browser, ensuring no data is stored or shared externally.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Unique Patterns?
